name: Shooty McShooty Game
description:
Description:

Kill the enemies, knock around the furniture. What else could you need in a game?
Okay visuals, fun gameplay, a lot of enemies. Oh and you bark when you get hurt.
When you die the game restarts so be careful :P

To shoot: click left mouse button
To jump: space bar
To move: WASD

Extra: have fun trying to get the bed out of the door :)
it's fun trying to put all the furniture in the pool so have fun :)

Don't forget to have fun playing and don't die!
